title: PROJECT: Alpha Set
body: I have been debating whether to get the alpha set bundle but have been wondering if the bundle will still be available during the second week(September 17th - 24th). If so will the price be lowered as some of the project skins will be discounted to a price of 975 rp. If anybody has any answer related to these questions please answer.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This bundle is only available through September 15th.
they havent stated anything yet, but it seems to me like this is something only for the First Strike Promotion, so i have my doubts theyll keep the bundle even after the skins go on a discount!
